title: Ratigan

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Make a robot replica of someone, giving you a single charge of one of their abilities
- Give someone to Felicia, dealing an astral powerful attack to them. This costs 2 malice.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Limited use abilities are prioritized over unlimited use ones.
- You cannot get day abilities or abilities that self confirm you. You can, however, get abilities that kill.

fields.name: Malice Overflow:
fields.value:
- Making Felicia's dinner is now an Overkill attack.
- You can now get unlimited charges.
